## Description
Briefly describe your changes.

## 8 Principles Checklist

### 1. Minimize Code
- [ ] All functions < 30 lines
- [ ] All classes < 5 responsibilities
- [ ] All files < 300 lines

### 2. Minimize Coupling
- [ ] Dependencies injected
- [ ] No tight coupling
- [ ] Easy to test

### 3. One Responsibility
- [ ] Clear responsibility
- [ ] No diffusion of logic
- [ ] Obvious owner

### 4. Explicitness
- [ ] No decorators
- [ ] No magic behavior
- [ ] All deps visible

### 5. Errors Are Design
- [ ] All paths handled
- [ ] Timeouts configured
- [ ] Retries with backoff

### 6. Code for Humans
- [ ] Clear names
- [ ] Types as documentation
- [ ] Readable structure

### 7. Global State
- [ ] Minimal usage
- [ ] Explicit
- [ ] Controlled

### 8. KISS
- [ ] Simple solution
- [ ] Not over-engineered
- [ ] Understandable

## Quality Checks
- [ ] `make lint` passes
- [ ] `make type-check` passes
- [ ] `make format` applied
- [ ] No console.log or debugger
- [ ] Tests written
- [ ] Documentation updated

## Ready?
- [ ] All checkboxes checked
- [ ] Ready for review
